channel.title: houston flood on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in houston flood on Barefoot Rob

item.title: houston flooded 3
item.description: Houston flooded pics!! 9 October 1998 Updated 27 October 1998 with dry pictures Here is the original entry from when Houston flooded. Walking down Montrose toward the intersection with Allen Parkway, we saw this. "Wow; it's flooded." Yes, but understand that Allen Parkway goes under that intersection. Here is the normal version. This was taken from the middle of the intersection. I like how the red light reflects on the water.
